subject: Broken control box.
description_text:
Hi there, I accidentally broke the little controller box that all 3 pedals
plug into. I’d like to purchase a new one from you guys. Photos attached.

conversations.body_text: Hi Kyle Nemechek,   You can purchase the PlusX control unit from this link. It is compatible with your older pedals and also supports the latest SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2 software, including force feedback display and vibration functionality.       https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor?variant=51351053533498

Thank you!

On Sun, Nov 30, 2025 at 7:14 PM service@simsonn.com
